solution_line_template: The total amount of money Mr. Haj used to pay for employee salary is {salary_fraction}*${total_operation_costs} = $<<{salary_fraction}*{total_operation_costs}={employee_salary}>>{employee_salary}
After paying the employee salaries, Mr. Haj remains with ${total_operation_costs}-${employee_salary} = $<<{total_operation_costs}-{employee_salary}={remaining_after_salary}>>{remaining_after_salary}
He also uses 1/4*${remaining_after_salary}= $<<{remaining_after_salary}/{delivery_divisor}={delivery_costs}>>{delivery_costs} on delivery costs.
The remaining amount of money that he uses to pay for orders is ${remaining_after_salary}-${delivery_costs} = $<<{remaining_after_salary}-{delivery_costs}={orders_cost}>>{orders_cost}
